p: To measure the impact of NP genotype on 1MG minigenome activity ( Figure 5B), we expressed NP-R111 or NP mutants with the rest of the EBOV replication complex (VP35, VP30, L), the FLuc-encoding 1MG minigenome, and an RLuc-encoding plasmid to control for transfection efficiency ( n = 3 biological replicates each). We normalized FLuc by RLuc luminescence for each replicate, then normalized all values to the average FLuc/RLuc ratio of the NP-R111 replicates. We performed ANOVA with Dunnettâ€™s post-test, in which each condition was compared to NP-R111 to generate corrected p-values using Prism 7.
